Name: InterviewerInstructionSchemeName
Description: A name for the InterviewerInstructionScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the InterviewerInstructionScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the InterviewerInstructionScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: InterviewerInstructionSchemeReference
Description: Allows for the inclusion of an existing InterviewerInstructionScheme by reference.

Name: InstructionGroupReference
Description: In-line description of a group of Instructions.
